statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT description FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT id, name, description FROM products WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, price, description FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 AND price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT id, name, description FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM demand_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_trends WHERE demand_level = 'high' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC, price ASC;

SELECT products.product_name, products.price, demand_trends.demand_level FROM products JOIN demand_trends ON products.product_id = demand_trends.product_id WHERE demand_trends.demand_level = 'medium';
SELECT product_name, trend_date, demand_level FROM products INNER JOIN demand_trends ON products.product_id = demand_trends.product_id WHERE products.product_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT products.product_name, customers.customer_name, reviews.rating FROM products JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id JOIN customers ON reviews.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id=101;
SELECT trend_id, month_year, trend_description FROM trends WHERE demand_level > 0.5;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT month_year, demand_level, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_id = 5;
